summary: Centers on the rise and fall of four blue-collar men who team with a destitute prostitute to create a high-priced escort service.
cast: Ving Rhames|Bijou Phillips|Danny Masterson|Ben Crowley|Daniel London|Thomas Ian Nicholas|Alexandra Breckenridge|Sean Derry|Annie Kitral|Alanna Janell|Tom Kurlander|Billy Elmer|Ryan Gorham|Falconer Hudson|John W. Iwanonkiw|Tommy Lafitte|Mike Miklosko|Corey Rieger|Rejeana Silla|Max Starks|Tom Verlihay|Tony Amen|William Kania|Jeremy Moon|Jackson Nunn|Dwayne Pintoff|Mike Wittlin
title: The Bridge to Nowhere
